docs.lead_paragraph: A telegraphic message appears in the second edition of the Chronicle, to the effect that the Moniteur of Friday contains a decree for the levy of 80,000 recruits. The Breslau Gazette states that there are a considerable number of French Legitimists at present with the Count DE CHAMBORD at Venice.

headline.main: FROM CALIFORNIA.; ARRIVAL OF THE PROMETHEUS. THE JENNY LIND EXPLOSION. THE LOSS OF THE S. S. LEWIS. MISCELLANEOUS INTELLIGENCE. Nicaragua about to take Possession of Greytown. LATER FROM THE SANDWICH ISLANDS. Explosion of the Jenny Lind. Loss of the Steamer S. S. Lewis. The Mines. Miscellaneous.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Steamer Prmethcus, Capt. CHURCHILL, arrived yesterday morning, from SanJuan del Norte. To the Purser we are indebted for favors. The Prometheus left San Juan on Wednesday morning, the 4th inst., bringing 400 passengers, and $170,000 in gold dust on freight, also a large amount in the hands of passengers, and dates to the 17th ult. from San Francisco, having made the passage in 7 days and 22 hours.

docs.lead_paragraph: Tile funeral of the late JOHN FARRAR, LL, D., took place at Cambridge, Mass., yesterday morning. Professor FARRAR was for many years the Hollis Professor of Natural Philosophy and the Mathemnaties in Harvard University. He was a native of Lincoln, Mass., and graduated at Harvard with tile class of 1803, just half a century ago.

docs.lead_paragraph: A sick Bachelor! A dying camel in the desert! A sailor on a hen-coop in the middle of the Atlantic All the same. The same incident from different points of view. The same subject with varied accessories. If there is a preponderance of inisery on any side it is on the side of the sick bachelor.

headline.main: FRANCE.; A Duel between a Critic and a Poet--The Appointment of Mr. Soule--Table-spinning--Electrical Experiments--Deaths and Funerals in Paris--Gossip.

docs.lead_paragraph: We might have lost one of our best dramatic poets the other day, in a duel; of M. EMILE ANGIER, the author of La Cique, Diane and Philiberts, has fought one with M. MONSELET, fevilleturiste and theatrical critic. The poet thought he discerned in one of the critic's articles an attack upon his honor, and proposed a set-to with small swords.

byline.original: Correspondence of the Neiv- York Daily Times

docs.lead_paragraph: The Governor has appointed MARTIN HEALD, as Judge of Hillsboro County, and MARTIN CHASE, Judge of Sullivan County. Hon. JOHN SULLIVAN has been re-appointed Attorney-General of the State, and ALFRED R. HATCH, Solicitor of Rockingham County.
docs.snippet: The Governor has appointed MARTIN HEALD, as Judge of Hillsboro County, and MARTIN CHASE, Judge of Sullivan County. Hon. JOHN SULLIVAN has been re-appointed Attorney-General of the State, and ALFRED R. HATCH, Solicitor of Rockingham County.

docs.lead_paragraph: The new Spanish Ministers have published their programme. Letters from Madrid state that in that capital the programme was regarded by some as a promise that the Constitution should not be disturbed, the words favoring this view being those which declare the affection of the people for "the political system inaugurated by the fortunate accession of Her Majesty to the throne." Others believed this phrase to be a concealed jibe at the nation.

headline.main: Railroad Combinations in Ohio.; To the Editor of the New-York Daily Times:

docs.lead_paragraph: Two months or more since, it was announced in the public journals, (and among them the TIMES,) that arrangements had been made, whereby the fare for the coming season, between Cincinnati and New-York, would be very low. A matter of ten dollars for a through ticket.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; The Aldermen in Session.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Board met yesterday at 5 P. M. RICHARD T. COMPTON, Esq., in the Chair Present-Aldermen Haley, Sturtevant, Oakley, Boyce, Brisley, Francis, Tieman, Bard, Ward, Denman and Peck. Bull's Ferry.--Alderman WARD presented a petition from Messrs. Russ Reid, for the lease of a dock for ferry purposes, at some convenient point on the Island, opposite Bull's Ferry, on the Jersey shore.

docs.lead_paragraph: The oath of office was administered, to-day, to several clerks recently appointed, among them EDWARD H. FULLER, who was shot by SCHAUMBERG, who appeared to have fully recovered his health. The three most prominent candidates for the Chargeship to the Hague are WALL, STEVENS, and VANDERPPOOL.
